document_data.name: Kobold Language
document_data.mainbody: The '''kobold language''' was a form of communication used among [[kobold]]s.
document_data.Speakers: In addition to the kobolds spread across the breadth of [[Faerûn]] and the [[Underdark]], the kobold language was used among many of the merchants who did business within the [[Shining Lands]] of the [[Shining South]].
